707020f-a.title: Brooklyn: Ave. T - 4th St. W.
707020f-a.text:
Ave. 1. Hendrick J. Lotts, smokehouse or ice house,
Ave. I., Tlatlands.
East side Strome Kill, Flatbush.
on Ryders Pond
Photographer: D.8. Austin, 22 Christopher St.,
Oceanside, L.I, N.Y. (90 yrs. old in 1952)
707020f-a.folder: Ave. T & 4th St. W., Brooklyn, NY

702366f-a.title: Brooklyn: 4th Street (West) - Avenue T
702366f-a.text:
197821994 West 4th Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Ave. T.
The frame building at the corner is No. 1994 West 4th Street.
April 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
